Prompt

(Maybe long essay)

In Rep. 435c-441c Socrates argues that there are three distinct parts of the soul. First write a brief characterization of each part, then re-write, in your own words, Socratesâ€™ arguments that these parts are distinct from one another.

Further Instruction

  • Write 400-600 words. No more. No less.
  • Submit your responses by Mon. @ 1pm.
